name: Agarta
storyline: Agarta is a serial killer story. You will observe the plans of a man who questions the themes of justice and law on earth to achieve the result. It was designed to show you how precious and important every decision you make in your individual life, because every choice you make is also a renunciation and you cannot reverse any decision.
summary: Agarta is an interactive live-action game (FMV), it follows the story of a serial killer nicknamed the Surgeon. You will observe his plans as he questions the themes of justice and law on earth. You have to choose wisely because any decisions you make will lead you to one of the 19 finals.
